examplePhrases: Ask diabetes assistant about my plan for today
Ask diabetes assistant about my glucose level yesterday at dinner
en-GB.name: diabetes assistant
en-GB.description: The Alexa Diabetes Voice Assistant. Helps you keep track of your medication and blood glucose levels.

examplePhrases: Alexa abre el asistente de diabetes
Pregunta al asistente de diabetes sobre mi tratamiento
Pregunta al asistente de diabetes sobre mis niveles de azucar de anoche
Dile al asistente de diabetes que registre mi nivel de glucosa
